ModMetaData.name: Gravship Launch Info
ModMetaData.author: EpicDuck
ModMetaData.description:
An info display for your gravship showing launch important information at a glance: [list] [*] time until next launch [*] missing ship components [*] connected substructure exceeds limit [*] missing fuel [*] not installed engine [/list]
Are you missing a setting or feature? Are you experiencing errors? Feel free to report this here!
